Articles.Content: Hello KSP community. I have just recently bought the game and it's taken over my life. I have never experienced anything like it and I'm looking forward to learning how to be a good kerbonaut from this intelligent community.

Hey there! Welcome to the forums. I hope you have a nice time here.

Have fun and happy flying!

from this intelligent community.

Why, we're flattered!

Welcome aboard and have fun! I like your name, BTW!

Hello KSP community. I have just recently bought the game and it's taken over my life. I have never experienced anything like it and I'm looking forward to learning how to be a good kerbonaut from this intelligent community.

welcome welcome! space suits to the left, coffee to the right, and getting your mind blown by the raw genius of the community, why, thats behind each door, around every corner and right behind YOU!
